definition: The act of evading a straightforward statement or shifting one's opinions; equivocation or desertion of a cause.
example: The politician's constant tergiversation on the controversial policy left the voters confused about his true stance.

definition: To gulp down something quickly and greedily.
example: I need to xertz this energy drink before the boss fight starts!

definition: The act of stretching and yawning at the same time.
example: After a twelve-hour subathon, a long pandiculation is exactly what I need.

definition: A string of symbols used in comics to represent swear words.
example: The streamer's rant was censored with a long string of grawlix.

definition: To confuse, perplex, or fluster.
example: The player's chaotic movement was designed to bumfuzzle their opponent in the arena.

definition: Secret or dishonest activity or maneuvering; silly or high-spirited behavior.
example: The stream was full of hilarious shenanigans during the community game night.

definition: To leave abruptly or secretively.
example: The speedrunner had to absquatulate when the glitch ruined his perfect run.

definition: The warmth of the sun in winter.
example: The chat enjoyed a moment of apricity during the cozy winter stream.

definition: The alignment of three celestial bodies in a straight line.
example: The rare syzygy caused a spectacular solar eclipse during the livestream.

definition: Mental calmness and composure, especially in a difficult situation.
example: He maintained his equanimity even after falling into the lava for the tenth time.

definition: The act of cultivating or growing a beard or mustache.
example: After three months of pogonotrophy, his beard finally looked legendary.

definition: A shrewd, unprincipled person, especially a politician who acts for personal gain.
example: The chat called the greedy merchant in the game a total snollygoster.

definition: The inability to remember a particular word or name.
example: I had a moment of lethologica when trying to remember my best friend's dog's name.

definition: Relating to or characterized by play or playfulness.
example: The streamer's ludic personality kept the chat entertained for hours.

definition: Dishonest or underhanded behavior.
example: There was some serious skulduggery happening in the tournament lobby tonight.

definition: Having a ready insight into and understanding of things.
example: The perspicacious viewer noticed the secret door before the streamer did.

definition: Occurring or recurring every day; commonplace.
example: Even the quotidian task of inventory management looks epic with this soundtrack.

definition: A harsh, discordant mixture of sounds.
example: The chat became a cacophony of alerts when the sub goal was reached.

definition: The realization that each random passerby is living a life as complex as yours.
example: Seeing all the chatters made him feel a sudden sense of sonder.

definition: A commotion or fuss, especially one caused by conflicting views.
example: There was a huge kerfuffle in the chat when the streamer lost the match.

definition: The pleasant, earthy smell that frequently accompanies the first rain after a dry spell.
example: After the long summer heatwave, the petrichor filled the air during the storm.

definition: Sweet or musical; pleasant to hear.
example: The streamer's mellifluous voice made the long grind much more relaxing.

definition: Weird, ghostly, or uncanny, especially in a frightening or supernatural way.
example: The streamer encountered an eldritch horror at the bottom of the haunted dungeon.

definition: To throw a person or thing out of a window.
example: The gamer wanted to defenestrate his controller after losing the final boss fight.

definition: Giving opinions on subjects that one knows nothing about.
example: Don't be an ultracrepidarian in the comments about a game you never played.
